channel.title: Comments on: Better late than never. Frustrating at times, but feels good to have made it. Now I can enjoy S6 and not worry about grinding for anything.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: CuatroBoy
item.dc:creator: CuatroBoy
item.description:
Got Dark Matter Ultra in season 2 and thought the same thing. Now I find myself coming back to get gold on every new weapon and melee they add to the game. The curse of being a completionist.
Congrats on the DM Ultra though man. It sure isn't easy
item.content:encoded:
Got Dark Matter Ultra in season 2 and thought the same thing. Now I find myself coming back to get gold on every new weapon and melee they add to the game. The curse of being a completionist.

Congrats on the DM Ultra though man. It sure isn’t easy
